Mayor & City Council
====================

Mayor & City Council
--------------------

[City Council](https://www.windcrest-tx.gov/232/City-Council)
-------------------------------------------------------------

Every 2 years the Windcrest Residents elect 5 City Council members who they want to represent them and listen to their wants for the city's future.

* See a short biography of each council member and a photo of them
* Get the contact information for each council member

[Mayor](https://www.windcrest-tx.gov/231/Mayor)
-----------------------------------------------

The Mayor is the Chief Elected Officer of the City of Windcrest. The City has elected Mayor Dan Reese.

* See a short biography of our Mayor and a photo of him
* Get the contact information for the Mayor
